item.title: Home prices fell, but the peak spring selling season was still weak. What’s next?
item.description: Builder KB Home cut its outlook for sales, profitability and home prices, as affordability and worries about the economy are keeping demand weak.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
